title: thEn ena inikum
sahitya:
,tEn ena inikkum | ,tiruvarutkaDalE |



,teLLiya amuda- | mE sivamE ||



tEn.. ena inikkum | ,tiruvarutkaDalE











anupallavi 







vaanena nindra | ,daivamE ||



vaanena nindra | ,daivamE mullai ||



vaayil vaazhum maasilaa maNiyE O |



(tEn)







caraNam







,oonenu nindru | ,unarvilE eni- ||



num, oonenu nindru | ,unarvilE eni- ||



num, un tiru kOyil | ,vandaDaindaar || 



,En ena kElaay | ,tirundanai ||



,En ena kElaay | ,tirundanai ayyaa ||



eedu mun tiru va- | rutkiyalbO... ||



(tEn)
